text: Everett "Vic" Firth (June 2, 1930 - July 26, 2015) was an American musician. He was the founder of Vic Firth Company (formerly Vic Firth, Inc.), a company that makes percussion sticks and mallets. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Musicians from Massachusetts Category:Musicians from Maine
title: Vic Firth
